blog.name: dancing-heart-pony
blog.title: Blaine 🦄🏳️‍🌈
blog.description:
| 21 | MI, 🇺🇸| Enby | He/They |

Art suggestions are always appreciated!

Buy me a Ko-fi, I guess

💜💜💜💙💙💙💚💚💚

I like MLP, Sims, Fallout, Pokémon, Disney, Warrior Cats, Harry Potter, Undertale, Animal Crossing, and YouTubers

Fav Shows: Doctor Who, Supernatural, Parks and Rec, OITNB, Steven Universe, Stranger Things, and GoT

Current obsession: Waiting for Animal Crossing Switch

OTP(s): Septiplier, Danti, Tythan

Fav Song ATM: Trampoline — SHAED

Enjoy the random crap I reblog and my art sometimes.

—Icon made with FaceQ—

summary: Pokémon Direct 6.5.19 Recap - New Legendaries, Trainers, Pokémon, Dynamax & More
title: Pokémon Direct 6.5.19 Recap - New Legendaries, Trainers, Pokémon, Dynamax & More
body:
Pokémon Direct 6.5.19 Recap – New Legendaries, Trainers, Pokémon, Dynamax & More

Howzat?! The Pokémon Direct 6.5.19 has aired and finished and now its time to ruddy well talk about it. So let’s not dawdle any longer than we need to Ol’ Chap, its time to go over what we learned with our spiffing Pokémon Direct 6.5.19 Recap.

Well to start with, Players will get to venture through lush grassland in the Galar Region Countryside. New Pokémon were shown and the new Dynamax Feature…

View On WordPress

summary:
The Pokémon Direct Post 



 Welcome to the Pokémon Direct thread where I’ll be covering the Japanese feed. You can watch it...
body:
The Pokémon Direct Post

Welcome to the Pokémon Direct thread where I’ll be covering the Japanese feed. You can watch it live on YouTube and niconico. The Direct will be approximately 15 minutes in length and feature new Sword and Shield information. Global times are 06:00 PT, 09:00 ET, 14:00 BST, 15:00 CEST, and 22:00 JST. More follows.

(more…)

View On WordPress

tags: it's in an hour leave me alone
body:
Pokémon Direct Predictions

Route One babies (rat, bird, what have you)

Professor (hoping female)

Rival characters

A bit of story/lore (what Galar’s deal is)

Box Art feat. Legendaries

Probably a sneak peek into a new mechanic or two aka LET POKÉMON FOLLOW YOU AGAIN
